content: You know the drill with the Poison Chiefs at this stage, where heavy attacks, Immobilize, and the Plantain Fan can all help to make short work of it. Once you're done with the final one, hop back onto the Somersault Cloud.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Deer Sight Forest' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Poison Chief 4'.
The content is as follows:
You know the drill with the Poison Chiefs at this stage, where heavy attacks, Immobilize, and the Plantain Fan can all help to make short work of it. Once you're done with the final one, hop back onto the Somersault Cloud.
